titles.title: Everett Alvarez, Jr., Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2022
To award a Congressional Gold Medal to Everett Alvarez, Jr., in recognition of his service to the Nation.
Everett Alvarez, Jr., Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2022

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Everett Alvarez, Jr., Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2022
This bill provides for the award of a Congressional Gold Medal to Everett Alvarez, Jr. in recognition of his service to the nation.
